page.title: 10KINSON_MY WEEKENDS.
page.content: On Saturdays my Dad comes down from London and he takes us to Christchurch which is about 6 miles away and we go to Tucktonia. On Sundays we go to the shops on the Wimborne Road which is in Kinson. We go to Sperrings, a newsagents which is also a grocer's and food shop. It also sells tobacco and films for cameras. Then we go skating in the town.We get our skates at 10am. and come back at 12 noon.We have a roast dinner and after we stay at home.In the evening we watch T.V..All the activities I do are out of Kinson.
